description: Golden dataset for PayPal RAG retrieval quality evaluation. Each reference_context is a distinct fact substring that must appear in retrieved chunks.

queries.query: When was PayPal founded and by whom?
queries.reference: PayPal was originally established by Max Levchin, Peter Thiel, and Luke Nosek in December 1998 as Fieldlink, later renamed Confinity.
reference_contexts: established by Max Levchin, Peter Thiel, and Luke Nosek in December 1998 as Fieldlink

queries.query: How much did eBay pay to acquire PayPal?
queries.reference: eBay acquired PayPal on October 3, 2002, for $1.5 billion in eBay stock.
reference_contexts: eBay acquired the company on October 3, 2002

queries.query: When did PayPal go public and at what IPO price?
queries.reference: PayPal's IPO listed on NASDAQ under the ticker PYPL at $13 per share and generated over $61 million.
reference_contexts: listed on NASDAQ under the ticker PYPL

queries.query: When did eBay spin off PayPal?
queries.reference: The spin-off was announced on September 30, 2014 and completed on July 18, 2015.

queries.query: What was PayPal's total payment volume in 2012?
queries.reference: By the end of 2012, PayPal's total payment volume processed was US$145 billion.
reference_contexts: total payment volume processed was US$145 billion

queries.reference: In February 2026, PayPal announced the appointment of Enrique Lores as CEO, replacing Alex Chriss.

queries.query: How much did PayPal pay for iZettle?
queries.reference: PayPal agreed to purchase Swedish payment processor iZettle for $2.2 billion in May 2018.
For fiscal year 2019, PayPal reported annual revenue of $17.772 billion, an increase of 15% over the previous fiscal cycle, with earnings of US$2.459 billion.
reference_contexts: increase of 15% over the previous fiscal cycle

queries.reference: Honey (now PayPal Honey) is a browser extension that automatically applies online coupons on e-commerce websites. Founded in 2012 by Ryan Hudson and George Ruan, it was acquired by PayPal in 2020 for approximately $4 billion.
reference_contexts: browser extension that automatically applies online coupons
Founded in 2012 by Ryan Hudson and George Ruan
acquired by PayPal in 2020 for approximately $4 billion

queries.query: How much did PayPal pay to acquire Honey?
queries.reference: PayPal acquired Honey in 2020 for approximately $4 billion, making it PayPal's largest acquisition.
reference_contexts: acquired by PayPal for about $4 billion

queries.reference: PayPal.Me is a peer-to-peer payment platform launched on September 1, 2015 that allows users to send a custom link to request funds via text, email, or other messaging platforms.
reference_contexts: send a custom link to request funds

queries.query: How much did PayPal pay for Xoom?
queries.reference: PayPal spent $25 a share in cash to acquire Xoom, or about $1.09 billion.

queries.query: Who are the members of the PayPal Mafia?
queries.reference: Key members of the PayPal Mafia include Peter Thiel (founder/CEO), Elon Musk (X.com founder), Max Levchin (CTO, CEO of Affirm), Reid Hoffman (founded LinkedIn).
reference_contexts: Peter Thiel, PayPal founder and former CEO
Elon Musk, co-founder of Zip2 and founder of X.com
Max Levchin, founder and chief technology officer at PayPal
Reid Hoffman, former executive vice president who founded LinkedIn

queries.query: What companies did PayPal Mafia members found?
queries.reference: PayPal Mafia members founded or developed LinkedIn, Palantir Technologies, SpaceX, Affirm, Slide, Kiva, YouTube, Yelp, and Yammer.
reference_contexts: such as LinkedIn, Palantir Technologies, SpaceX
Affirm, Slide, Kiva, YouTube, Yelp, and Yammer

queries.query: How much did PayPal pay for Braintree?
queries.reference: PayPal acquired Braintree, a Chicago-based payment gateway, on September 26, 2013 for $800 million.
PayPal acquired Venmo on September 26, 2013 for $26.2 million.
Yes, PayPal is available in Ukraine. Ukrainian customers can send and receive payments between family and friends, and PayPal is temporarily waiving fees for all Ukrainian accounts.
reference_contexts: Ukrainian customers can send and receive payments
waiving our fees for all Ukrainian accounts

queries.query: What security features does PayPal offer?
queries.reference: PayPal uses encryption technology to help make sure money transfers are secure.
